feed.title: GitHub Dart Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of Dart in GitHub

entry.title: Solido/awesome-flutter
entry.summary:
An awesome list that curates the best Flutter libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more.

Flutter is Google‚Äôs UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. If you appreciate the content üìñ, support projects visibility, give üëç| ‚≠ê| üëè

Demonstrations

Instant Chat Integration

with Stream!

 
BMW
Connect

Calendar 
Meteo

Contents

  • Articles
  • Videos
  • Components
  • Navigation
  • Template
  • Plugins
  • Frameworks
  • Experimental
  • Open Source Apps
  • Web
  • Utilities
  • Books
  • Bonus
  • Community

Articles

Introduction

  • Google IO 2018 - Building beautiful, flexible user interfaces.
  • Presentation - by Helio S. Junior.
  • Flutter Web - Ins and Outs of Flutter Web by Nash.

Websites / Blogs

  • Welcome to Flutter - English and French blog dedicated to providing practical solutions to most asked questions about Flutter by Didier Boelens.
  • SZA≈ÅKO-BLOG - Step by step advanced design by Marcin Szalek.
  • Flutter by Example - Tutorials based on Redux, Firebase, Custom Animations, and UI.
  • Flutter Institute - Very original content and tutorials by Brian Armstrong.
  • Iirokrankka.com - Articles and tutorials and anything related by Iiro Krankka.
  • Norbert - In depth articles, features and app creation by Norbert515.
  • Flutter Tips - Articles, tips & tricks in the development by Diego Vel√°squez.
  • FilledStacks - Tutorials and guides on development by Dane Mackier.
  • Awesome Flutter tips - Tips to help developers increase productivity by erluxman.

Tutorial

  • Animated Chat - Building beautiful UIs by Google Code Labs.
  • Firebase Chat - Firebase integration by Google Code Labs.
  • Planets-Flutter: from design to app - Detailed planets design tutorial.
  • Todo List [259‚≠ê] ‚Äì Step by step tutorial how to build Todo List with Flutter by Andrei Lesnitsky
  • Flutter and Dart development - Articles and tutorials by Suragch.

Beginner

  • Roadmap to Flutter Development [2795‚≠ê] - Visual roadmap with principles, patterns, and frameworks for Flutter newbies by Olexandr Leuschenko.
  • Layout Cheat Sheet - Extensive examples of layout widgets by Tomek Pola≈Ñski.
  • Getting Started with Flutter - by raywenderlich.com.
  • Beginner's Guide [123‚≠ê] - Comprehensive guide to the basics of Flutter and Firebase by Anthony.

Intermediate

  • Flutter state management for minimalists - Understanding app architecture without relying on third-party frameworks by Suragch. See also State Management.

Advanced

  • Rendering Pipeline [799üëç] and Let's build a render tree - Engine architecture by Adam Barth.
  • Render Objects - What are Widgets, RenderObjects and Elements? by Norbert515.
  • Streams and RxDart - Skillmatters presentation by Brian Egan.
  • Gesture System - Flutter Deep Dive: Gestures by Nash.
  • Schemas - Widget, State, Context and InheritedWidget explanations by Didier Boelens.
  • Rendering Engine Tutorial - Flutter's Rendering Engine: A Tutorial by AbdulRahman AlHamali.
  • Inherited Widget - Flutter‚Äôs InheritedWidget to hold app state by Chema Molins.
  • From Mobile to Desktop - Building applications for smartphones and desktops by Marcelo Henrique Neppel.
  • Accessibility widgets - Deep dive information about all aspects of accessibility by Muhammed Salih G√ºler.
  • Profiling w/ Timeline - Using the Timeline allows you to find and address specific performance issues in your application by Chinmay Garde.

Howtos

  • Parallax Effect - Parallax & non linear animation by Marcin Szalek.
  • Build Flavor - Define build configurations and switch them by Salvatore Giordano.
  • Build Flavor - Easily build flavors in Flutter (Android and iOS) with flutter_flavorizr by Angelo Cassano.

Videos

  • Boring Show - Exploration with the Flutter Team.
  • Tensor Programming [86üé¨] - Very rich content by Tensor Programming.
  • Mtechviral [245üé¨] - [Hindi/English] Mtechviral Series By Pawan Kumar.
  • Flutter in Practice - Free video courssd for beginners & non-programmers by Zaiste.
  • Whatsupcoders [82üé¨] - Free video series on Flutter Widgets by Kamal.
  • Reso Coder - Intermediate and advanced videos by Matej Re≈°et√°r.

Components

Demonstrations

  • Official Gallery - Demo for the material design widgets provided by Flutter Team.
  • Flutter Examples [5861‚≠ê] - Simple basic isolated apps for devs by Nishant Srivastava.
  • Flutter Catalog [1601‚≠ê] - showcasing Flutter components, with side-by-side source code view, by X-Wei.
  • Generative Art [401‚≠ê] - Generative Art by Robert Felker.

UI

  • StaggeredGridView [2292‚≠ê] - GridView with tiles of variable sizes by Romain Rastel.
  • Radial Menu [401‚≠ê] - Animated Radial Menu by Victor Choueiri.
  • Tinder Cards [646‚≠ê] - Tinder like cards swipe effect by Ivascu Adrian.
  • Flip Panel [461‚≠ê] - Flip panel with built-in animation by HungHD.
  • Facebook Reactions [261‚≠ê] - Facebook reactions widget by Duy Tran.
  • Flushbar [818‚≠ê] - Highly configurable Snackbar by Andre Haueisen.
  • Stepper Touch [238‚≠ê] - Lateral value stepper nicely animated by Raouf Rahiche.
  • Typeahead [560‚≠ê] - Display overlay suggestions to users as they type by Abdul Rahman Al Hamali.
  • Snaplist [366‚≠ê] - Create snappable list views by David Leibovych.
  • Pin Code [252‚≠ê] - Animated & customisable Pin code for login and OTP by Liew Jun Tung.
  • Folding Cell [430‚≠ê] - Fold your widget by Faob.
  • Liquid Pull To Refresh [922‚≠ê] - A beautiful and custom refresh indicator by Ayush Agarwal.
  • Slide Container Slide vertically and horizontally with a smooth dampened motion by Quentin Le Guennec.
  • Direct Select - Selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup by Ivan Yatsouba.
  • Before After [580‚≠ê] - Beautiful slider which makes it easier to display the difference between two images, by Sahil Kumar.
  • Scratcher [306‚≠ê] - Scratch card widget which temporarily hides content from user, by Kamil Rykowski.
  • Image Sequence Animator [104‚≠ê] - A simple widget for animating a set of images with full custom controls as an alternative to using a GIF file by Ali Yigit Bireroglu.
  • Beautiful_Popup [452‚≠ê] - Beautify your app popup by jaweii.
  • Credit Card Form [317‚≠ê] - Animated credit card input form Origogi.
  • Animated Selection Slide An animated selection widget by swiping by Sezgin Bilgetay.
  • Flutter Tags [332‚≠ê] - Tags with different customizations by Di Natale Antonino.
  • Flutter Neumorphic [1329‚≠ê] - Ready to use Neumorphic kit for Flutter with üï∂Ô∏è dark mode.
  • Dough [388‚≠ê] - Widgets for a squishy user interface by Josiah Saunders.
  • Card Settings [356‚≠ê] - package for building settings forms by codegrue.
  • Timelines [413‚≠ê] - Powerful & Easy to use timeline package by Chulwoo Park.
  • Timeline Tile [446‚≠ê] - A tile to help build beautiful and customisable timelines by Julio Bitencourt.
  • Rounded Loading Button [127‚≠ê] - Button with a loading indicator, complete with success and error animations by Chris Edgington.
  • PlutoGrid [182‚≠ê] - Web and desktop datagrid that can be controlled by the keyboard by bosskmk.

Sticky Headers

  • Sticky Infinite List [234‚≠ê] - Highly configurable multi directional infinite list with Sticky Headers by TatsuUkraine.
  • Sticky Header [666‚≠ê] - Sliver based sticky headers by Romain Rastel.
  • Sticky Headers [731‚≠ê] - Configurable sticky headers by Simon Lightfoot.

Drawers

  • Hidden Drawer Menu [231‚≠ê] - Beautiful drawer mode menu feature with perspective animations by Rafael Almeida Barbosa.
  • Flutter Inner Drawer [385‚≠ê] - Easy way to create an internal drawer (left / right) where you can enter a list-menu or other by Di Natale Antonino.

Bottom bars

  • Fancy Bottom Navigation [545‚≠ê] - Animated bottom navigation by Tony Owen.
  • Circular Bottom Navigation [439‚≠ê] - Beautiful animated bottom navigation bar by Iman Khoshabi.
  • Bottom Navy Bar [775‚≠ê] - Beautiful and colorful animated bottom navigation bar by Pedro Massango.
  • Titled Navigation Bar [291‚≠ê] - Animated bottom navigation bar that switch between icon and title by Pedro Massango.
  • Google Nav Bar [409‚≠ê] - A modern google style nav bar for flutter by Sooxt98.

Bottom Sheets

  • Rubber Bottom Sheet [418‚≠ê] - Elastic material bottom sheet by Mattia Crovero.
  • Modal Bottom Sheet [1082‚≠ê] - Modal bottom sheet with Material, Cupertino iOS13 or custom appareance by Jaime Blasco.

Sliders

  • RangeSlider [318‚≠ê] - 2-thumb configurable RangeSlider by Didier Boelens.
  • Fluid Slider [262‚≠ê] - A slider with a minimal design and fluid like animation by Vamsi Krishna.
  • Flutter Xlider [336‚≠ê] - A material design slider and range slider, horizontal and vertical, with RTL support by Ali-Azmoud.

UI Helpers

  • Reorderables [442‚≠ê] - Drag&Drop Table, Row, Column, Wrap(Grid) and SliverList elements by Hansheng Chiu.
  • Liquid Pull To Refresh [922‚≠ê] - A beautiful and custom refresh indicator by Ayush Agarwal.
  • Infinite Listview [206‚≠ê] - Infinite scroll in both directions by Simon Lightfoot.
  • Offline [742‚≠ê] - Tidy utility to handle offline/online connectivity by Jeremiah Ogbomo.
  • Scroll To Index [332‚≠ê] - Scroll to specified child element with given index for SliverList/ListView by Jerry Chen.
  • In View Notifier List - ListView that notify when widgets are on screen within a provided area by Vamsi Krishna.
  • ShowCaseView [687‚≠ê] - Way to showcase your app features on iOS and Android by Simform.

Material Design

  • Unicorn Speed Dial [300‚≠ê] - Floating Action Button with Speed Dial by Tiago Martins.
  • Slidable [2008‚≠ê] - Slidable list item with left and right slide actions by Romain Rastel.

Cupertino Design

  • Peek & Pop [188‚≠ê] - Peek & Pop implementation based on the iOS functionality by Ali Yigit Bireroglu.

Effect

  • Frosted Glass - Render effect by Collin Jackson.
  • Parallax [735‚≠ê] - ViewPager by Iiro Krankka.
  • Shimmer [1387‚≠ê] - Shimmer effect while content is loading by HungHD.
  • Wave [742‚≠ê] - Displaying some waves with custom color, duration, floating and blur effects by RockerFlower.
  • Liquid Swipe - Liquid swipe to your stacked containers by Sahdeep Singh.
  • PhotoFilters [297‚≠ê] - Apply filters to an image by Sharafudheen KK.
  • Shine [137‚≠ê] - Pretty shadows with dynamic light positions by Jonathan Monga.
  • Clay Containers [369‚≠ê] - Neumorphic widget primitives to serve as the foundation of your own designs by Michael Charles.

Calendar

  • Calendar Widget [162‚≠ê] - Calendar widget by David Bennett.
  • Calendar Carousel Widget - Calendar carousel by dooboolab
  • Table Calendar [1167‚≠ê] - Calendar organized neatly into a Table, with vertical autosizing by Aleksander Wo≈∫niak.
  • Time Planner [66‚≠ê] - A beautiful, easy to use and customizable time planner for flutter mobile, desktop and web by Mohammad Jamalianpour.

Login

  • Login Animation [1044‚≠ê] - Smooth animation from login to home by Ruchika Gupta.
  • Flutter Login - Login widget with slick animation from start to finish by NearHuscarl.

Backend-Driven

  • Dynamic Widget [1100‚≠ê] - Build your dynamic UI with json, and the json format is very similar with flutter widget code by Denny Deng.

Image

  • Carousel Slider [1178‚≠ê] - Carousel slider widget, support infinite scroll and custom child widget by serenader.
  • Parallax Image [238‚≠ê] - Image parallax by Anatoly Pulyaevskiy.
  • Photo View [1478‚≠ê] - Scalable image view with loading placeholder by Renan C. Ara√∫jo.
  • SVG [1270‚≠ê] - SVG parsing, rendering, and widget library by Dan Field.
  • Image Cropper [814‚≠ê] - Crop your images support ratio, rotation, zoom by HungHD.
  • Cached Network Image [1911‚≠ê] - Show images from the internet and keep them in the cache directory by.
  • Lottie [665‚≠ê] - Use airbnb's popular After Effects Animation library by xvrh.
  • Bitmap [128‚≠ê] - Perform Bitmap manipulations (such as contrast and exposure) with a help from the Dart FFI by Renan C. Ara√∫jo.
  • Crop [171‚≠ê] - Crop any widget/image in Android, iOS, Web and Desktop by Mahdi K. Fard.

Image Picker

  • Image Picker - Images Selection by Collin Jackson.
  • WeChat Assets Picker [811‚≠ê] - Assets picker in WeChat style, support multi assets by Alex Li.

Map

  • Google Map View [415‚≠ê] - Displaying google map plugin by AppTree Software.
  • GeoCoder [162‚≠ê] - Forward and reverse geocoding by Alo√Øs Deniel.
  • Mapbox GL [251‚≠ê] - Interactive, customizable vector maps by Mapbox.
  • AMap [504‚≠ê] - Access to AMap services(È´òÂæ∑Âú∞Âõæ) by fluttify-project.

Charts

  • Circular Chart [355‚≠ê] - Animated radial and pie charts by Victor Choueiri.
  • Sparkline [245‚≠ê] - Sparkline by Victor Choueiri.
  • Charts [2505‚≠ê] - By Google Charts Team.
  • Candlesticks [358‚≠ê] - OHLC and Trade Volume Charts by Trent Piercy.
  • FCharts [321‚≠ê] - Beautiful, responsive, animated charts by Keenan Thompson.
  • FL Chart [3846‚≠ê] - Draw fantastic charts in Flutter by Iman Khoshabi.
  • Bezier Chart [401‚≠ê] - Beautiful bezier line chart widget for flutter that is highly interactive and configurable by Diego Velasquez.
  • Echarts [533‚≠ê] - Large collection of advanced reactives charts by LIN Chen.
  • Graphic [383‚≠ê] - Data visualization library based on the Grammar of Graphics by LIN Chen.

Navigation

  • Fluro [3362‚≠ê] - The brightest, hippest, coolest router for Flutter with Navigation, wildcard, query, transitions by Posse.
  • PageView Indicator [132‚≠ê] - Build page indicators for the PageView by Leo Cavalcante.
  • Deep Link Navigation [53‚≠ê] - Elegant abstraction for complete deep linking navigation in Flutter by Dennis Krasnov.
  • Get [5499‚≠ê] - Navigate between screens & display snackbars/dialogs/bottomSheets without context by Jonny Borges.
  • Beamer [290‚≠ê] - Route through guarded page stacks and URLs using the Navigator 2.0 API effortlessly by Sandro Lovniƒçki.

Auth

  • Local Auth - Touch ID, lock code, fingerprint auth on iOS and Android.
  • Login [628‚≠ê] - FaceID, TouchID, and Fingerprint Reader by Rody Davis.
  • Google Sign-In - Google OAuth.
  • Firebase Auth - Firebase OAuth.
  • Facebook Login [399‚≠ê] - Authenticate with native Android & iOS Facebook login SDKs by Iiro Krankka.
  • Apple Sign-In [157‚≠ê] - Apple sign in by Tom Gilder.
  • OAuth [170‚≠ê] - Buffer, Strava, Unsplash, Github OAuth by Joe Birch.
  • Firebase Phone Auth - Phone number auth via SMS by Gild√°sio Filho.
  • SimpleAuth [314‚≠ê] - Azure Active Directory, Amazon, Dropbox, Facebook, Github, Google, Instagram, Linked In, Microsoft Live Connect, Github, OAuth, Basic Auth by James Clancey.
  • Flutter AppAuth [176‚≠ê] - Plugin that provides a wrapper around the AppAuth iOS and Android SDKs by Michael Bui.

Text & Rich Content

  • Markdown null - Markdown renderer for Flutter. It supports the original format, but no inline html.
  • Masked Text [244‚≠ê] - Masked text with custom and monetary formatting by Ben-hur Santos Ott.
  • Zefyr [2016‚≠ê] - Soft & gentle rich text editor by Memspace.
  • AutoSizeText [1496‚≠ê] - Automatically resizes text to fit perfectly within its bounds by Simon Leier.
  • Parsed Text [190‚≠ê] - Interactive text based on content recognition, also supports Regex by Fayeed Pawaskar.
  • TeX [186‚≠ê] - Render Mathematics Equations with full HTML and JavaScript support by Shahzad Akram.
  • Code Field - Customizable code field widget supporting syntax highlighting by Bertrand Bevillard.

Forms

  • Form Builder [935‚≠ê] - Framework that simplifies building forms, validating fields, reacting to changes, and collecting the final user input by Danvick Miller.
  • Reactive Forms [233‚≠ê] - Model-driven approach to handling Forms inputs and validations, heavily inspired in Angular's Reactive Forms.

Analytics

  • Usage [123‚≠ê] - Google Analytics wrapper for command-line, web, and Flutter apps.
  • Firebase Analytics - Connect to Firebase Analytics API.
  • Pure Mixpanel [21‚≠ê] - Analytics for the popular Mixpanel.com Nick Manning.

Internationalization

  • GenLang [88‚≠ê] - Code generator for Internationalization by King Wu.
  • Flutter Translate [279‚≠ê] - Internationalization (i18n) library by Florin Bratan.
  • attranslate - Semi-automated translation of ARB or JSON files by fkirc.

Styling

  • Flutterial [1437‚≠ê] - Flutter Material Theme explorer by Erick Ghaumez.
  • Pigment [184‚≠ê] - Simple but useful package for use colors in flutter.

Media

Audio

  • Flutter Audio Recorder - Provides full controls and access to recording details such as level metering by Wenyan Li.
  • Audio Recorder [169‚≠ê] - Record audio and store it locally by Jordan Alcaraz.
  • Flutter Sound [666‚≠ê] - Flutter audio recorder and player at one hand by dooboolab.
  • AssetsAudioPlayer [567‚≠ê] Simultaneous playback of audio from assets/network/file and displaying notifications [android / ios / web / macos]
  • Audio Service - System background audio support by Ryan Heise. Tutorial by Suragch.

Video

  • WebRTC [2747‚≠ê] - WebRTC plugin for iOS/Android by CloudWebRtc.
  • Chewie [1353‚≠ê] - Provides low-level access to video playback by Brian Egan.
  • Video Trimmer [276‚≠ê] - Visualise and trim videos by Souvik Biswas.
  • CamerAwesome [295‚≠ê] - Community camera plugin rework by Apparence.io studio.

Voice

  • Speech Recognition [323‚≠ê] - Speech to text by Erick Ghaumez.
  • OK Google - Integrate google assistant by Marcin Szalek.

Storage

  • Firebase Storage - Firebase as data storage.
  • Secure Storage [723‚≠ê] - Keychain and Keystore storage by German Saprykin.

Preferences

  • Streaming Shared Preferences - Reactive key-value store, shared preferences with Streams by Iiro Krankka.

Monetization

  • Admob - GoogleAdmob supports interstitial ads in both iOS and Android by Brett Nesbitt.
  • Firebase AdMob - Ad integration using Firebase.
  • Inapp Purchase [464‚≠ê] - Features set of 'in app purchase' derived from react-native-iap by dooboolab.
  • Admob Flutter - Admob plugin that shows banner ads using native platform views by Youssef Kababe & Kevin McGill.
  • Facebook Audience Network - Facebook Audience Network Ad plugin that shows banner, interstitial, in-stream video, rewarded video & natvie ads by Dreamsoft Innovations.
  • Square In-App Payments SDK [283‚≠ê] - Take payments by embedding a card entry form in your app that produces nonces from customer-provided card information or digital wallets by Square.

Templates

  • Movie Details [372‚≠ê] - Movie details page by Iiro Krankka.
  • Mates [482‚≠ê] - How to load profiles from the randomuser.me API and a nice profile details page by Iiro Krankka.
  • Weather [141‚≠ê] - Weather app to learn how to use Canvas and Animation by Alessandro Aime.
  • TodoMVC [7528‚≠ê] - TODO application ready to go with different flavors : Vanilla, Redux, built_redux by Brian Egan.
  • Restaurant Menu [553‚≠ê] - Restaurant menu by Braulio Cassule.
  • UI Challenges [1272‚≠ê] - Profile, Travel, Food App by Tomi Alagbe.
  • Cupertino Settings [219‚≠ê] - iOS Settings by Matthias Rupp.
  • Music Player [205‚≠ê] - music player component by Tobe O.
  • Dashboard [814‚≠ê] - Dashboard and Shop Items by Ivascu Adrian.
  • Todo [519‚≠ê] - Todo template from Dribble by Marc L.
  • Card Swipe Animation [462‚≠ê] - Swipe cards template by Ruchika Gupta.
  • UI Kit [5707‚≠ê] - Collection of useful UIs in a UIKit by Pawan Kumar.
  • Book [300‚≠ê] - Bookshelf by Ardiansyah Putra.
  • The Gorgeous Login [1497‚≠ê] - Design and smooth login template by Hugo Extrat.
  • Liquid Pay Payment App [251‚≠ê] - Liquid Pay App Concept by Long Hoang.
  • DrawApp [208‚≠ê] - Sample Drawing App to demonstrate how to allow user to draw onto canvas with color picker and brush thickness slider by Jake Gough.
  • Starter Kit [596‚≠ê] - App Store implementation to learn Bloc, RxDart, Sqflite, Fluro and Dio. by King Wu.
  • Feather [472‚≠ê] - Beautiful weather application. Application includes RxDart, Dio, BLoC, i18n, unit and widget tests. by Jakub Homlala.
  • Clone UI Challenges [1280‚≠ê] - Collection of useful UIs clones by Javier Gonz√°lez.
  • FlutterFoodybite [1113‚≠ê] - Beautiful food app UI template by JideGuru.
  • Flutter Samples [2464‚≠ê] - Collection of nice flutter samples by Diego Vel√°squez.
  • ActingWeb First_App [285‚≠ê] - Starter app with basic elements for a team-developed production-quality app by Greger Wedel.
  • Smart Washing Machine [590‚≠ê] - Smart washing machine UI challenge app with Box2D physic engine by Tomasz Pawlikowski.
  • Beautiful Timelines [186‚≠ê] - A set of beautiful timelines by Julio Bitencourt.

Clone

  • GitTouch [979‚≠ê] - Open source mobile client for GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket and Gitea by Rongjian Zhang.

Machine Learning

  • MLKit [377‚≠ê] - Firebase Machine Learning Kit by Naoya Yoshizawa.
  • m2cgen [1953‚≠ê] - CLI tool to convert ML models into native Dart code by BayesWitnesses.

Vision

  • ML Vision Camera Stream [218‚≠ê] - ML vision recognitions (QRcode, face, ...) with live camera stream by Aumard Jimmy and Santetis.
  • Google Mobile Vision [433‚≠ê] - Google Mobile Vision by Eduardo Folly.

Augmented Reality

  • ARKit Plugin [612‚≠ê] - Wrapper for ARKit - Apple's augmented reality platform for iOS by Olexandr Leuschenko.
  • ARCore Plugin [316‚≠ê] - Augmented reality with ARCore platform by Gian Marco Di Francesco.

Plugins

  • Pub packages - Packages filter in Dart Pub Repository.
  • Plugins - Official Flutter Team Plugins.

Device

  • WebView [1376‚≠ê] - Render web content by Hadrien Lejard.
  • Location [836‚≠ê] - Handle location, handling callbacks to get continuous location by Lyokone.
  • Battery - Access various information about the battery.
  • Proximity Sensor Plugin - A plugin to access the proximity sensor of your device by Manoj NB.
  • Geolocation [214‚≠ê] - Fully featured geolocation plugin: current location, location updates, geocode, places and more by Loup.
  • Local Notifications [1715‚≠ê] - Plugin for displaying local notifications by Michael Bui.
  • Device Calendar - Plugin for modifying calendars on the user's device by Built to Roam.
  • Badger [233‚≠ê] - Update app badge on the launcher by Edouard Marquez.
  • UDID [166‚≠ê] - Persistent UDID across app reinstalls by Leon Kukuk.
  • Downloader [655‚≠ê] - Create and manage download tasks by HungHD.
  • InAppWebView [1688‚≠ê] - Add inline WebView widgets or open an in-app browser window by Lorenzo Pichilli.
  • AppAvailability [80‚≠ê] - List, launch and check installed apps by Lorenzo Pichilli.
  • File Picker [719‚≠ê] - Native file explorer to load absolute file path by Miguel Ruivo.
  • VPN - Access VPN services by Jason C.H.
  • Geolocator - A Flutter geolocation plugin which provides easy access to the platform specific location services by Baseflow.
  • Permission Handler - A Flutter permission plugin which provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API to request and check permissions by Baseflow.
  • WidgetKit - A plugins which allows you to create a Widget-Extention for iOS by Thomas Leiter.

Scanner

  • QR Code Reader [218‚≠ê] - QR Code reader plugin by Matheus Villela.
  • Fast QR Reader View [275‚≠ê] - Live multicode reader by Facundo Medica.

Bluetooth / NFC / Beacon

  • Blue [1914‚≠ê] - Bluetooth by Paul DeMarco.
  • Beacons [75‚≠ê] - Flutter beacons plugin by Loup.
  • NFC Reader [285‚≠ê] - NFC reader plugin for iOS and Android by Matteo Crippa.
  • Beacon broadcast [70‚≠ê] - Library for turning your phone into a beacon by Paulina Szklarska.
  • Reactive Ble [272‚≠ê] - Handles BLE operations for multiple devices by Philips Hue.
  • NFC Manager [83‚≠ê] - Generic NFC plugin for iOS and Android by Naoki Okada.

Storage

  • Sqflite [2289‚≠ê] - SQLite flutter plugin by Alexandre Roux.
  • Moor - Moor is an easy to use, reactive, typesafe persistence library for Dart & Flutter by . Simon Binder

Services

  • Dialogflow [186‚≠ê] - Plugin to easily integrate with dialogflow by Victor Rances.
  • Intercom [23‚≠ê] - Add Intercom integration to your app by Maido Kaara.
  • OneSignal [497‚≠ê] - Push notification service by OneSignal.
  • Place Dialog [45‚≠ê] - Places picker dialog returning the places to the app by David Bennett.
  • App Rating [30‚≠ê] - Requesting and Writing Reviews for the App Store and Google Play by Rody Davis.

Frameworks

State management

Standard

  • Bloc [8181‚≠ê] - Collection of packages that help implement the BLoC design pattern by Felix Angelov.
  • MobX [2037‚≠ê] - Supercharge the state-management in your apps with Transparent Functional Reactive Programming (TFRP). Port of MobX from the Js/React land.
  • Provider [3974‚≠ê] - State-management library for Flutter by Remi Rousselet.
  • RiverPod [2214‚≠ê] - Provider, but different by Remi Rousselet.
  • GetX - Contextless, State-management & navigation by Jonny Borges.
  • Binder [167‚≠ê] - A lightweight, yet powerful way to bind your application state with your business logic, by Romain Rastel.

Redux / ELM / Dependency Injection

  • Built redux [81‚≠ê] - Automatic subscribing to your redux stores. Based on the built pattern by David Marne.
  • Redux.dart [486‚≠ê] - Port of Redux to Dart with an ecosystem of middleware, Flutter integrations, and time traveling dev tools by John Ryan and Brian Egan.
  • Redux [1522‚≠ê] - Built to work with redux.dart, utilities that allow you to easily consume a Redux Store to build Widgets.
  • Inject [847‚≠ê] - Compile-time dependency injection by Google.
  • Flux [368‚≠ê] - Implementation of the Flux framework by Google.
  • Fish [7214‚≠ê] - Alibaba Redux implementation.
  • Async Redux [199‚≠ê] - Redux without boilerplate. Allows for both sync and async reducers by Marcelo Glasberg.

Widgets

  • Hooks [1965‚≠ê] - Advanced code sharing between widgets by Remi Rousselet.
  • Functional widget [435‚≠ê] - Code generator writing widgets as functions with annotations by Remi Rousselet.

Data

  • Graphql [2796‚≠ê] - Implementation of the GraphQL spec by Zino App B.V..
  • GeoFlutterFire [244‚≠ê] - Implementation of GeoFirestore for flutter by Darshan Gowda.
  • Ferry [334‚≠ê] - Powerful & Extensible GraphQL Client by Sat Mandir Khalsa.

Backend

  • Dynamic Widget [1100‚≠ê] - Build your dynamic UI with json, and the json format is very similar with flutter widget code by Denny Deng.
  • NETCoreSync - Centralized database synchronization framework for multiple clients, built on top of Moor library by Aldy J.
  • Parse for Flutter [394‚≠ê] - Open source backend framework by ParsePlatform.

Animation

  • Sequence Animation [338‚≠ê] - Composite staggered animations by Norbert Kozsir.
  • SpinKit [2405‚≠ê] - Animated loading indicators by Jeremiah Ogbomo.
  • Villains [328‚≠ê] - Page transition animations by Norbert Kozsir.
  • AnimatedTextKit [1268‚≠ê] - A collection of cool text animations by Ayush Agarwal.
  • Drawing Animation [384‚≠ê] - Create drawing line animations based on SVG path data by Carl Hauck.
  • Simple Animations - Create awesome custom animations easily by Felix Blaschke.
  • Flutter-animation-set [264‚≠ê] - Easy to build an animation set by efoxTeam.
  • Staggered Animations [977‚≠ê] - Easily add staggered animations to your ListView, GridView, Column and Row by mobiten.
  • Animate Do - Animation package inspired in Animate.css by Fernando Herrera.
  • Funvas [361‚≠ê] - Create fun time based canvas animations by creativecreatorormaybenot.

Testing

  • Flutter Gherkin [150‚≠ê] - Fully featured Gherkin parser and UI automated test runner by Jon Samwell.

Web

  • Responsive Framework [702‚≠ê] - Automatically adapt UI to different screen sizes. Responsiveness made simple by Codelessly.

Experimental

This section contains libraries that take an experimental or unorthodox approach.

  • styled_widget [671‚≠ê] - Simplifying your widget tree structure by defining widgets using methods by Rein Gundersen Bentdal.

Engines

Rendering

  • Graphx [293‚≠ê] - Making drawings and animations extremely simple, inspired by Flash, by Roi Peker.

Game

  • Flame [5173‚≠ê] - Minimalist game engine by Luan Nico.
  • SpriteWidget [1186‚≠ê] - Toolkit for building complex, high performance animations and 2D games by Viktor Lidholt.

Open source games

  • Flip [201‚≠ê] - Reversi game by Andrew Brogdon.
  • 2048 [205‚≠ê] - 2048 game by Anuran Barman.
  • TRex [316‚≠ê] - Port of the famous Chrome's Trex game by Renan C. Ara√∫jo.
  • Crush [409‚≠ê] - How to build a Math-3 game, like Candy Crush, Bejeweled by Didier Boelens.
  • Slide Puzzle [152‚≠ê] - Classic slide (15) puzzle by Kevin Moore.
  • Tetris [1280‚≠ê] - Tetris game by YangBin.
  • Party Charades [165‚≠ê] - Party charades by Kamil Rykowski.
  • Ghost Rigger [159‚≠ê] - Ghost Rigger is a cyberpunk inspired puzzle game by Iain Smith and Julio Ernesto Rodr√≠guez Caba√±as.
  • Space Empires [32‚≠ê] - A 4X Space themed strategy game by Satyam Sharma.

Game Engine resources

  • Awesome Flame - Curated list of the best Flame games, projects, libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more by Flame Engine.

Open Source Apps

Premium

  • History Of Everything [5887‚≠ê] - Animated vertical timeline of humanity by 2D, Inc.
  • Developer Quest [2917‚≠ê] - Become a tech lead, slay bugs by 2D, Inc.
  • AppFlowy [12156‚≠ê] - The Open Source Notion Alternative. You are in charge of your data and customizations. Built with Flutter and Rust by AppFlowy team.

Top

  • Flutter Team Samples [10919‚≠ê] - Collection of examples (including maps, json, Material and Cupertino) by the Flutter team.
  • Flutter Common Widgets [22910‚≠ê] - Collection of official widgets demos & docs in chinese to help developers learn quickly by Alibaba Auction Frontend Team.
  • Meme Chat [514‚≠ê] - Chat app on Flutter, using Firebase, Google Sign In, and device camera integration by a team of Googlers.
  • Flitter [183‚≠ê] - Glitter app by Hadrien Lejard and Kevin Segaud. It uses Redux and Jaguar.
  • Lime [356‚≠ê] - Lime social network by Sebastian Sellmair.
  • Planets [711‚≠ê] - Planet exploration that demonstrate rich UI by Sergi Mart√≠nez.
  • NewsBuzz [505‚≠ê] - Firebase backed news reader using News API by Ankur Kedia.
  • DroidKaigi2018-flutter [513‚≠ê] - Unofficial conference app for DroidKaigi 2018 Tokyo by konifar.
  • Music Player [1332‚≠ê] - Full featured music player by Pawan Kumar.
  • WhatTodo [910‚≠ê] - Todoist like UI by Burhanuddin Rashid.
  • FlutterGram [1939‚≠ê] - Complete Instagram based on Firestore & Google Functions by MDanics.
  • BookSearch [472‚≠ê] - Digital BookShelf for your reading progress by Norbert515.
  • Cinematic [832‚≠ê] - UI for Movie DB Public API by Aaron Oertel.
  • Beer-Me-Up [441‚≠ê] - Beer tracking nicely designed by Benoit Letondor.
  • Trace [789‚≠ê] - Modern and powerful crypto portfolio & market explorer by Trent Piercy.
  • Taskist [729‚≠ê] - Taskist is a ToDo List app for Task Management by Hugo EXTRAT.
  • Tourism [251‚≠ê] - Tourism app based on redux w/ animations & i18n by blueMix.
  • Trinity Orientation @ Univ Toronto [562‚≠ê] - Orientation week at Trinity College, U of T by Matthew Tory.
  • Transform Widget - Image widgets as 3D game engine sprites by Paul Thomas.
  • Deer [297‚≠ê] - Minimalist Todo Planner built using BLoC pattern by Aleksander Wo≈∫niak.
  • TailorMade [235‚≠ê] - Managing a Fashion designer's daily routine using a mixture of ReBLoC w/ Firebase Cloud Store & Functions by Jeremiah Ogbomo.
  • Instory [194‚≠ê] - Instgram story downloader with a beautiful UI Sarath.
  • Spacex-Go [645‚≠ê] - Simple yet powerful, open-source SpaceX launch tracker. jesusrp98.
  • Superhero Interaction [218‚≠ê] - Cool Superhero interaction animation by Pinkesh Darji.
  • Reply [535‚≠ê] - 'Reply' Material Design case study by Frederik Schweiger.
  • Enigma - Privacy chat with end-to-end encryption by AmitJoki.
  • Chillify - Fancy music app made with Provider and Bloc pattern by Karim Elghamry.
  • Pokedex - Pokedex app with beautiful UI and smooth animation by Hung Pham.
  • Timy Messenger [1742‚≠ê] - Group messaging app with a focus on organizing events by Miguel Beltran and Franz Heinfling.
  • GitJournal [1717‚≠ê] - Journaling your data in a Git Repo by Vishesh Handa.
  • AuthPass [1061‚≠ê] - Keepass compatible password manager for mobile and desktop by hpoul.
  • Fwitter [1523‚≠ê] - Full Twitter clone using Firebase solution by Sonu Sharma.
  • Harpy [825‚≠ê] - Feature rich Twitter client by Roberto Doering.

Utilities

  • Launcher Icons - Generate your launcher icons easily by Mark O'Sullivan and Franz Silva.
  • FlutterIcon [310‚≠ê] - Icon set generator by Mike Hoolehan.
  • FVM [2233‚≠ê] - Flutter Version Management: A simple cli to manage Flutter SDK versions.
  • Environment Configuration [86‚≠ê] - CLI tool to generate .env configurations for application environments by TatsuUkraine.
  • Flutter Flavorizr [160‚≠ê] - CLI utility to easily generate flavors for Android and iOS in less than 3 minutes by Angelo Cassano.
  • Fontify [77‚≠ê] - CLI tool to convert SVG icons to OTF font and generate Flutter-compatible class by Igor Kharakhordin.
  • FlutterGen [791‚≠ê] - Assets code generator for your images, fonts, colors, etc ‚Äî Get rid of String-based APIs.
  • Very Good Cli [1135‚≠ê] - Very Good Command Line Interface for Dart created by Very Good Ventures.
  • Flutter Sidekick [544‚≠ê] - Simple app to make Flutter development more delightful by Leo Farias.
  • Dart Code Metrics [430‚≠ê] - Additional linter which reports code metrics, checks for anti-patterns and provides additional rules for the Dart analyzer by Dart Code Checker team.

VSCode

  • Awesome Snippets - Collection of commonly used classes and methods by Nash.
  • Flutter Files - Quick generation for BLoC templates files by context menu by Gorniv.
  • Flutter Intl - i18n binding from arb files by Localizely.

IntelliJ / Android Studio

  • Enhancement_Suite [196‚≠ê] - Search for pub.dev libraries, update version, Bloc, Snippet, etc you're covered by Marius H√∂fler.
  • Flutter Intl - 18n binding from arb files by Localizely.

Desktop

  • Desktop Embedding [6950‚≠ê] - Desktop implementations of the Flutter embedding API by Google.
  • Golang Desktop Embedder [5083‚≠ê] - Golang embedder for desktop by Pierre Champion.
  • Native Shell [372‚≠ê] - Experimental embedder for Flutter by Matej Knopp.
  • Rust Desktop Embedder [1871‚≠ê] - Rust embedder for desktop by juju.
  • bitsdojo_window - Customize windows owner-drawn chrome by BitsDojo.
  • Raspberry Pi Embedder [747‚≠ê] - Light-weight Embedder for Raspberry Pi by Hannes Winkler.
  • Fluent UI [566‚≠ê] - Microsoft's Fluent Design System in Flutter by Bruno D'Luka.
  • MacOS UI [492‚≠ê] - Widgets and themes implementing the current macOS design language by Groovin Chip.
  • Ubuntu Yaru [134‚≠ê] - Distinct look and feel of the Ubuntu Desktop by Ubuntu.
  • Awesome Flutter Desktop [516‚≠ê] - A curated list of awesome things related to Flutter desktop by LeanFlutter.

Books

Learning Flutter - Beginners

  • Beginning App Development - by Rap Payne.
  • Beginning Flutter - by Marco Napoli.
  • Flutter for Beginners - by Alessandro Biessek.
  • Flutter in Action - by Eric Windmill.
  • Learn Google Flutter Fast - by Mark Clow.

Cookbooks

  • Practical Flutter - by Frank Zammetti.

Podcasts

English

  • It's all widgets! Flutter podcast - by Hillel Coren.

Portuguese

  • Universo Flutter - by Matias de Andrea.

Spanish

  • C√≥digo Flutter - by Guillermo Garc√≠a.

Russian

  • Flutter Dev Podcast - by Eugene Saturov.

Bonus

  • It's All Widgets! - Open list of published apps by Hillel Coren, Thomas Burkhart, Simon Lightfoot and Scott Stoll.
  • Awesome Flutter Linux - A curated list of awesome Linux-specific Flutter packages and projects by J-P Nurmi.

Fun

  • The One [444üëç]

Hardware

  • Matrix2 - Sense Hat's LED matrix control game by bus710.

Guide & Interviews

  • Interview Questions - List of helpful questions you can use to interview potential candidates by Whatsupcoders.
  • The International Flutter Starter Kit - Guide by the experts by Beyza Sunay Guler & Nawal Alhamwi.

Community

Presentation material

  • Logo - Logo for stickers impressions.

Communication

  • r/FlutterDev - Reddit community by u/JaapVermeulen.
  • Discord - Discord server to discuss and get help by Pritykin.
  • Flutter Community - Central place for community made packages.
  • OpenFlutter - Make it easier ËÆ© Flutter Êõ¥ÁÆÄÂçï.

Misc

entry.title: firebase/flutterfire
entry.summary:
üî• A collection of Firebase plugins for Flutter apps.

FlutterFire

[Changelog] ‚Ä¢ [Packages]

FlutterFire is a set of Flutter plugins that enable Flutter apps to use Firebase services. You can follow an example that shows how to use these plugins in the Firebase for Flutter codelab.

Flutter is Google‚Äôs UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. Flutter is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

Documentation

  • Add Firebase to your Flutter app
  • Available plugins
  • Firebase UI
    • Firebase UI for Authentication
    • Firebase UI for Realtime Database
    • Firebase UI for Cloud Firestore
  • Firestore ODM (alpha)

Stable Plugins

Name pub.dev Firebase Product Documentation View Source Android iOS Web MacOS
Analytics üîó üìñ firebase_analytics ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Authentication üîó üìñ firebase_auth ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Cloud Firestore üîó üìñ cloud_firestore ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Cloud Functions üîó üìñ cloud_functions ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Cloud Messaging üîó üìñ firebase_messaging ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Cloud Storage üîó üìñ firebase_storage ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Core üîó üìñ firebase_core ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Crashlytics üîó üìñ firebase_crashlytics ‚úî ‚úî N/A Œ≤
Dynamic Links üîó üìñ firebase_dynamic_links ‚úî ‚úî N/A N/A
In-App Messaging üîó üìñ firebase_in_app_messaging ‚úî ‚úî N/A N/A
Installations üîó üìñ firebase_app_installations ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Performance Monitoring üîó üìñ firebase_performance ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî N/A
Realtime Database üîó üìñ firebase_database ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤
Remote Config üîó üìñ firebase_remote_config ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤

Beta Plugins

Name pub.dev Firebase Product Documentation View Source Android iOS Web MacOS
App Check üîó üìñ firebase_app_check ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤

Preview Plugins

Name pub.dev Firebase Product Documentation View Source Android iOS Web MacOS
ML Model Downloader üîó üìñ firebase_ml_model_downloader ‚úî ‚úî N/A Œ≤

Alpha Plugins

Name pub.dev Firebase Product Documentation View Source Android iOS Web MacOS
Cloud Firestore ODM üîó üìñ cloud_firestore_odm ‚úî ‚úî ‚úî Œ≤

Issues

Please file FlutterFire specific issues, bugs, or feature requests in our issue tracker.

Plugin issues that are not specific to FlutterFire can be filed in the Flutter issue tracker.

Contributing

If you wish to contribute a change to any of the existing plugins in this repo, please review our contribution guide and open a pull request.
